languages.text: Даже в таком тоскливом месте люди нашли в себе силы обустроить небольшой алтарь для молитв и содержать его в чистоте.
Even in a place as dismal as this, people have managed to set up a small altar at which to pray. It is relatively clean and well maintained.
languages.original_text: Даже в таком тоскливом месте люди нашли в себе силы обустроить небольшой алтарь для молитв и содержать его в чистоте.

traits.locale_text: Even in a place as dismal as this, people still have managed to set up a small altar to pray at. It is relatively clean and well maintained.
Even in a place as dismal as this, people still have managed to set up a small altar to pray at. It is relatively clean and well maintained.
Even in a place as dismal as this, people have managed to set up a small altar at which to pray. It is relatively clean and well maintained.

Even in a place as dismal as this, people have managed to set up a small altar at which to pray. It is relatively clean and well maintained.

languages.text: Incluso en un lugar tan funesto como este, la gente ha conseguido establecer un altar en el que rezar. Está relativamente limpio y bien cuidado.
languages.original_text: Even in a place as dismal as this, people have managed to set up a small altar at which to pray. It is relatively clean and well maintained.

traits.locale_text: Incluso en un lugar tan funesto como este, la gente ha conseguido establecer un altar en el que rezar. Está relativamente limpio y bien cuidado.

languages.text: 醜い場所でも、誰かが祈りを捧げるに小さな祭壇を作り上げることができた。祭壇は比較的きれいで、よく手入れされている。
languages.original_text: Even in a place as dismal as this, people have managed to set up a small altar at which to pray. It is relatively clean and well maintained.

traits.locale_text: Even in a place as dismal as this, people have managed to set up a small altar at which to pray. It is relatively clean and well maintained.

languages.text: 即便是在这种凄冷的地方，人们也想方设法搭了座小祭坛进行祈祷。这座祭坛看起来比较整洁，维护状况良好。
languages.original_text: Even in a place as dismal as this, people have managed to set up a small altar at which to pray. It is relatively clean and well maintained.

traits.locale_text: 即便是在这种凄冷的地方，人们也想方设法搭了座小祭坛进行祈祷。这座祭坛看起来比较整洁，维护状况良好。

languages.text: Selbst an einem so elenden Ort wie diesem haben Leute einen kleinen Altar errichtet, an dem sie beten. Er ist relativ sauber und gut gepflegt.
languages.original_text: Even in a place as dismal as this, people have managed to set up a small altar at which to pray. It is relatively clean and well maintained.

traits.locale_text: Selbst an einem so elenden Ort wie diesem haben Leute einen kleinen Altar errichtet, an dem sie beten. Er ist relativ sauber und gut gepflegt.

languages.text: Même en un lieu aussi sinistre, les gens ont réussi à bricoler un petit autel où prier. Il est relativement propre et bien entretenu.
languages.original_text: Even in a place as dismal as this, people have managed to set up a small altar at which to pray. It is relatively clean and well maintained.

traits.locale_text: Même en un lieu aussi sinistre, les gens ont réussi à bricoler un petit autel où prier. Il est relativement propre et bien entretenu.

languages.text: Böylesine kasvetli bir yerde bile insanlar, dua edecekleri ufak bir sunak dikmeyi başarmış. Nispeten temiz ve düzenli bakımı yapılır hâlde.
languages.original_text: Even in a place as dismal as this, people have managed to set up a small altar at which to pray. It is relatively clean and well maintained.
